title: Swap hero/header images for clean, modern visuals

requirements.text: Replace the existing hero/header images used at the top of each main tab with more visually appealing, clean, modern-day images while keeping the same image filenames and dimensions currently referenced by the UI.

quotes: Swap the header images for more visually appealing, clean, modern day images.

acceptanceCriteria: The hero/header images for Tasks, Dinner Rota, Calendar, and People appear updated in the UI without layout changes.
The image paths referenced by the UI remain unchanged (same filenames) so no broken images occur.
Images feel clean/modern (natural light, minimal clutter, contemporary look) and remain readable behind the existing gradient overlay.

requirements.text: Add the updated hero/header image files as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, matching the exact filenames referenced by the HeroHeader usage in each tab.

quotes: Swap the header images for more visually appealing, clean, modern day images.

acceptanceCriteria: The following assets exist in frontend/public/assets/generated and load successfully in the browser: header-tasks.dim_1600x420.jpg, header-dinner.dim_1600x420.jpg, header-calendar.dim_1600x420.jpg, header-people.dim_1600x420.jpg.
No console 404s occur for the header image assets when navigating across all tabs.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the backend unchanged; this request is purely about swapping static hero/header images.
nonGoals: Fixing the 'backup backend is not ready' / add-task readiness issue.
Changing HeroHeader layout/behavior beyond what is required to swap images.
Replacing non-header images (e.g., login card image or empty-state images).

required: Clean modern household task organization photo banner (header-tasks.dim_1600x420.jpg)
Clean modern family dinner prep/cooking photo banner (header-dinner.dim_1600x420.jpg)
